item.title: ImaginaryCTF 2023 - window-of-opportunity
item.description: This is a writeup that was done after the CTF since I was busy playing The Odyssey CTF with my team Emu Exploit and got 3rd place. This challenge is a kernel pwn challenge and it is not hard at all, however I decided to write something about it since the unintended solution for this one is quite interesting. window-of-opportunity (490 pts) - 11 solves - by Eth007 Description Sometimes, there is a glimmer of hope, a spark of inspiration, a window of opportunity.
